mn7:1.2: ekaṁ samayaṁ bhagavā sāvatthiyaṁ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
mn7:2.2: tamenaṁ rajako yasmiṁ yasmiṁ raṅgajāte upasaṁhareyya—yadi nīlakāya yadi pītakāya yadi lohitakāya yadi mañjiṭṭhakāya durattavaṇṇamevassa aparisuddhavaṇṇamevassa.
mn7:2.5: Evameva kho, bhikkhave, citte saṅkiliṭṭhe, duggati pāṭikaṅkhā.
mn7:2.7: tamenaṁ rajako yasmiṁ yasmiṁ raṅgajāte upasaṁhareyya—yadi nīlakāya yadi pītakāya yadi lohitakāya yadi mañjiṭṭhakāya—surattavaṇṇamevassa parisuddhavaṇṇamevassa.
mn7:2.10: Evameva kho, bhikkhave, citte asaṅkiliṭṭhe, sugati pāṭikaṅkhā.
mn7:3.2: Abhijjhāvisamalobho cittassa upakkileso, byāpādo cittassa upakkileso, kodho cittassa upakkileso, upanāho cittassa upakkileso, makkho cittassa upakkileso, paḷāso cittassa upakkileso, issā cittassa upakkileso, macchariyaṁ cittassa upakkileso, māyā cittassa upakkileso, sāṭheyyaṁ cittassa upakkileso, thambho cittassa upakkileso, sārambho cittassa upakkileso, māno cittassa upakkileso, atimāno cittassa upakkileso, mado cittassa upakkileso, pamādo cittassa upakkileso.
mn7:4.1: Sa kho so, bhikkhave, bhikkhu ‘abhijjhāvisamalobho cittassa upakkileso’ti—iti viditvā abhijjhāvisamalobhaṁ cittassa upakkilesaṁ pajahati;
mn7:4.3: iti viditvā byāpādaṁ cittassa upakkilesaṁ pajahati;
mn7:4.5: iti viditvā kodhaṁ cittassa upakkilesaṁ pajahati;
mn7:4.7: iti viditvā upanāhaṁ cittassa upakkilesaṁ pajahati;
mn7:4.9: iti viditvā makkhaṁ cittassa upakkilesaṁ pajahati;
mn7:4.11: iti viditvā paḷāsaṁ cittassa upakkilesaṁ pajahati;
mn7:4.13: iti viditvā issaṁ cittassa upakkilesaṁ pajahati;
mn7:4.15: iti viditvā macchariyaṁ cittassa upakkilesaṁ pajahati;
mn7:4.17: iti viditvā māyaṁ cittassa upakkilesaṁ pajahati;
mn7:4.19: iti viditvā sāṭheyyaṁ cittassa upakkilesaṁ pajahati;
mn7:4.21: iti viditvā thambhaṁ cittassa upakkilesaṁ pajahati;
mn7:4.23: iti viditvā sārambhaṁ cittassa upakkilesaṁ pajahati;
mn7:4.25: iti viditvā mānaṁ cittassa upakkilesaṁ pajahati;
mn7:4.27: iti viditvā atimānaṁ cittassa upakkilesaṁ pajahati;
mn7:4.29: iti viditvā madaṁ cittassa upakkilesaṁ pajahati;
mn7:4.31: iti viditvā pamādaṁ cittassa upakkilesaṁ pajahati.
mn7:5.1: Yato kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno ‘abhijjhāvisamalobho cittassa upakkileso’ti—iti viditvā abhijjhāvisamalobho cittassa upakkileso pahīno hoti,
mn7:5.3: iti viditvā byāpādo cittassa upakkileso pahīno hoti;
mn7:5.5: iti viditvā kodho cittassa upakkileso pahīno hoti;
mn7:5.7: iti viditvā upanāho cittassa upakkileso pahīno hoti;
mn7:5.9: iti viditvā makkho cittassa upakkileso pahīno hoti;
mn7:5.11: iti viditvā paḷāso cittassa upakkileso pahīno hoti;
mn7:5.13: iti viditvā issā cittassa upakkileso pahīno hoti;
mn7:5.15: iti viditvā macchariyaṁ cittassa upakkileso pahīno hoti;
mn7:5.17: iti viditvā māyā cittassa upakkileso pahīno hoti;
mn7:5.19: iti viditvā sāṭheyyaṁ cittassa upakkileso pahīno hoti;
mn7:5.21: iti viditvā thambho cittassa upakkileso pahīno hoti;
mn7:5.23: iti viditvā sārambho cittassa upakkileso pahīno hoti;
mn7:5.25: iti viditvā māno cittassa upakkileso pahīno hoti;
mn7:5.27: iti viditvā atimāno cittassa upakkileso pahīno hoti;
mn7:5.29: iti viditvā mado cittassa upakkileso pahīno hoti;
mn7:5.31: iti viditvā pamādo cittassa upakkileso pahīno hoti.
mn7:5.33: ‘itipi so bhagavā arahaṁ sammāsambuddho vijjācaraṇasampanno sugato lokavidū anuttaro purisadammasārathi satthā devamanussānaṁ buddho bhagavā’ti;
mn7:6.2: ‘svākkhāto bhagavatā dhammo sandiṭṭhiko akāliko ehipassiko opaneyyiko paccattaṁ veditabbo viññūhī’ti;
mn7:7.2: ‘suppaṭipanno bhagavato sāvakasaṅgho, ujuppaṭipanno bhagavato sāvakasaṅgho, ñāyappaṭipanno bhagavato sāvakasaṅgho, sāmīcippaṭipanno bhagavato sāvakasaṅgho, yadidaṁ cattāri purisayugāni, aṭṭha purisapuggalā. Esa bhagavato sāvakasaṅgho āhuneyyo pāhuneyyo dakkhiṇeyyo añjalikaraṇīyo, anuttaraṁ puññakkhettaṁ lokassā’ti.
mn7:8.1: Yathodhi kho panassa cattaṁ hoti vantaṁ muttaṁ pahīnaṁ paṭinissaṭṭhaṁ, so ‘buddhe aveccappasādena samannāgatomhī’ti labhati atthavedaṁ, labhati dhammavedaṁ, labhati dhammūpasaṁhitaṁ pāmojjaṁ.
mn7:8.2: Pamuditassa pīti jāyati, pītimanassa kāyo passambhati, passaddhakāyo sukhaṁ vedeti, sukhino cittaṁ samādhiyati;
mn7:10.1: saṅghe aveccappasādena samannāgatomhī’ti labhati atthavedaṁ, labhati dhammavedaṁ, labhati dhammūpasaṁhitaṁ pāmojjaṁ;
mn7:10.2: pamuditassa pīti jāyati, pītimanassa kāyo passambhati, passaddhakāyo sukhaṁ vedeti, sukhino cittaṁ samādhiyati.
mn7:11.1: ‘Yathodhi kho pana me cattaṁ vantaṁ muttaṁ pahīnaṁ paṭinissaṭṭhan’ti labhati atthavedaṁ, labhati dhammavedaṁ, labhati dhammūpasaṁhitaṁ pāmojjaṁ;
mn7:11.2: pamuditassa pīti jāyati, pītimanassa kāyo passambhati, passaddhakāyo sukhaṁ vedeti, sukhino cittaṁ samādhiyati.
mn7:12.1: Sa kho so, bhikkhave, bhikkhu evaṁsīlo evaṁdhammo evaṁpañño sālīnañcepi piṇḍapātaṁ bhuñjati vicitakāḷakaṁ anekasūpaṁ anekabyañjanaṁ, nevassa taṁ hoti antarāyāya.
mn7:12.2: Seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, vatthaṁ saṅkiliṭṭhaṁ malaggahitaṁ acchodakaṁ āgamma parisuddhaṁ hoti pariyodātaṁ, ukkāmukhaṁ vā panāgamma jātarūpaṁ parisuddhaṁ hoti pariyodātaṁ;
mn7:12.3: evameva kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu evaṁsīlo evaṁdhammo evaṁpañño sālīnañcepi piṇḍapātaṁ bhuñjati vicitakāḷakaṁ anekasūpaṁ anekabyañjanaṁ, nevassa taṁ hoti antarāyāya.
mn7:13.1: So mettāsahagatena cetasā ekaṁ disaṁ pharitvā viharati, tathā dutiyaṁ, tathā tatiyaṁ, tathā catutthaṁ. Iti uddhamadho tiriyaṁ sabbadhi sabbattatāya sabbāvantaṁ lokaṁ mettāsahagatena cetasā vipulena mahaggatena appamāṇena averena abyāpajjena pharitvā viharati;
mn7:16.1: upekkhāsahagatena cetasā ekaṁ disaṁ pharitvā viharati, tathā dutiyaṁ, tathā tatiyaṁ, tathā catutthaṁ. Iti uddhamadho tiriyaṁ sabbadhi sabbattatāya sabbāvantaṁ lokaṁ upekkhāsahagatena cetasā vipulena mahaggatena appamāṇena averena abyāpajjena pharitvā viharati.
mn7:17.1: So ‘atthi idaṁ, atthi hīnaṁ, atthi paṇītaṁ, atthi imassa saññāgatassa uttari nissaraṇan’ti pajānāti.
mn7:18.1: Tassa evaṁ jānato evaṁ passato kāmāsavāpi cittaṁ vimuccati, bhavāsavāpi cittaṁ vimuccati, avijjāsavāpi cittaṁ vimuccati.
mn7:18.3: ‘Khīṇā jāti, vusitaṁ brahmacariyaṁ, kataṁ karaṇīyaṁ, nāparaṁ itthattāyā’ti pajānāti.
mn7:19.1: Tena kho pana samayena sundarikabhāradvājo brāhmaṇo bhagavato avidūre nisinno hoti.
mn7:19.2: Atha kho sundarikabhāradvājo brāhmaṇo bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
mn7:19.3: “gacchati pana bhavaṁ gotamo bāhukaṁ nadiṁ sināyitun”ti?
mn7:19.6: “Lokkhasammatā hi, bho gotama, bāhukā nadī bahujanassa, puññasammatā hi, bho gotama, bāhukā nadī bahujanassa, bāhukāya pana nadiyā bahujano pāpakammaṁ kataṁ pavāhetī”ti.
mn7:20.1: Atha kho bhagavā sundarikabhāradvājaṁ brāhmaṇaṁ gāthāhi ajjhabhāsi:
mn7:21.1: Evaṁ vutte, sundarikabhāradvājo brāhmaṇo bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
mn7:21.3: Seyyathāpi, bho gotama, nikkujjitaṁ vā ukkujjeyya, paṭicchannaṁ vā vivareyya, mūḷhassa vā maggaṁ ācikkheyya, andhakāre vā telapajjotaṁ dhāreyya—cakkhumanto rūpāni dakkhantīti; evamevaṁ bhotā gotamena anekapariyāyena dhammo pakāsito.
mn7:21.4: Esāhaṁ bhavantaṁ gotamaṁ saraṇaṁ gacchāmi dhammañca bhikkhusaṅghañca.
mn7:21.5: Labheyyāhaṁ bhoto gotamassa santike pabbajjaṁ, labheyyaṁ upasampadan”ti.
mn7:22.1: Alattha kho sundarikabhāradvājo brāhmaṇo bhagavato santike pabbajjaṁ, alattha upasampadaṁ.
mn7:22.2: Acirūpasampanno kho panāyasmā bhāradvājo eko vūpakaṭṭho appamatto ātāpī pahitatto viharanto nacirasseva—yassatthāya kulaputtā sammadeva agārasmā anagāriyaṁ pabbajanti, tadanuttaraṁ—brahmacariyapariyosānaṁ diṭṭheva dhamme sayaṁ abhiññā sacchikatvā upasampajja vihāsi.
mn7:22.3: “Khīṇā jāti, vusitaṁ brahmacariyaṁ, kataṁ karaṇīyaṁ, nāparaṁ itthattāyā”ti abbhaññāsi.
mn7:22.4: Aññataro kho panāyasmā bhāradvājo arahataṁ ahosīti.
